description: head and shoulders of a woman looking outward with a furrowed brow and slight frown on her face; hair is pulled back and falls to the shoulders; background and garment is in a faded red; hair and neck area is a faded orange color; and face is grayish
inscription: LL of sheet, in pencil: (3 Steine) Einziges Exemplar im Handel | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: E 91-B-3 Steine | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: I. Fassung | LRC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 1950
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 23 | LL in pencil, below image: Frau.
title: Woman's Head (Sonia Gramatté)
